root: ^Oh, Marina! It's good to see you!
^Serena? It's good to see you too but... what are you doing all the way out here?
^It's a nice day for a walk. The trees are less ominous this afternoon and there aren't many animals on the road here....
^Alright, I'll be honest. The season's bad. Our crops are growing poor. It's been bad for everyone, but Thomas and I have been hit the hardest it seems.
^Thomas is too strong to be seen coming to your Mother for help. Even if it's all she's ever done for the village.
^Not saying we're unappreciative! Her help is always wanted! Even if most won't admit it. Not including me, of course.
^I know I could've waited till she came to the village but.... I didn't want anyone to see me asking. Especially Thomas.

c-0: ^I'm sorry to hear that. I know Mother would be happy to hear your support of her.
g-0: ^Unfortunately Mother's been ill as of late. She doesn't make the village worry so until she's better I'll be taking her place.
^Oh! That's wonderful to hear! About you handling the potions, not her sickness. Terrible news.
^So... will you be able to help out Thomas and I?
^Yes! I'll get on it right away.
^I will, after I get back from the village.

c-1: ^Yes! I'll get on it right away. I don't want you two to worry any longer.
c-2: ^I will, after I get back from the village. I have some things to take care of before I can start.

g-1: ^Thank you! You have no idea how much this means to the both of us!
^I'll hurry back now, don't worry I know my way around the forest. Send you mother my regards!
^task:A Spoiled Harvest $Serena $Poor Serena, this season has hit everyone in the village hard, them especially. Maybe I can make things a bit easier for them.
